name: Astrophy
description:
"We know from experience of moving organisms around on Earth that invasive species can have unexpected and unintended consequences"

And there you are... Ruthless and unforgivable, until everyone dies.

Astrophy is a project created for the Game In A Week #2 Game Jam. Kill all of the civilians and the army support to win.

Controls: Arrow Keys or WASD to move, Spacebar to shoot.

The game will be redesigned in the future and possibly ported to mobile platforms with more functionalities.
